Question
========

Out of every 100 people, 20 will be randomly chosen who will each win a €5 gift certificate. What then is the standard deviation of the amount won amount for one person?

Answerlist

* € 0,45
* € 2,00
* € 2,45
* € 4,45

Solution
========

Answerlist

* € 2,00: Correct
